item.title: Warped-MC awarded the Best Paper Award from ICPP 2023
item.description: Our paper entitled “Warped-MC: An Efficient Memory Controller Scheme for Massively Parallel Processors” was awarded the Best Paper Award from the 52nd International Conference on Parallel Processing (ICPP). Big congrats Jonghyun!!

item.title: Jongmin received an excellent research paper award from Korea University
item.description: Jongmin received an excellet research paper award from Korea University for the research paper entitled “CacheRewinder: Revoking Speculative Cache Updates Exploiting Write-Back Buffer” published in the proceedings of 2022 Design, Automation & Test in Europe Conference & Exhibition (DATE). Congrats Jongmin!

item.title: Awarded the innovative research lab initiation grant (최초혁신실험실) from NRF
item.description: Computer System Architecture (CSArch) Lab was awarded the innovative research lab initiation grant (최초혁신실험실) from National Research Foundation (NRF). The grant will allow us to set up fundamental research equipments for research on processor and memory system architecture. The amount of the grant is approximately $100,000. Thanks NRF!
